definition: to replace/to take the place of
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to substitute for/to take the place of/to replace/for/on behalf of/to stand in for
to do everything oneself (idiom); not to allow others in on the act
substitute
in place of sb's parents/in loco parentis (law)

sentences.english: In place of Isaac, God provided a ram for Abraham to sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 神为亚伯拉罕预备了献祭的公羊，代替以撒。

sentences.english: This is good, since you want to substitute values from files instead.
sentences.chinese: 这样很好，因为您想要用来自文件的替换值来代替。

sentences.english: The cortical corkification of the root replace epidermis.
sentences.chinese: 根以皮层木栓化，代替表皮。

sentences.english: You could actually use a closure to do the resource setup and cleanup instead.
sentences.chinese: 实际上可以使用闭包代替该方法来建立和清除资源。

sentences.english: Coumarin has been synthesized in Perkinreaction of acetic anhydride and salicylaldehydecatalyzed by anhydrous potassium carbonate.
sentences.chinese: 用无水碳酸钾代替无水醋酸钠催化合成了香豆素。

sentences.english: The diet is As It IS. Replacements are NOT recommended.
sentences.chinese: 餐单内食物请尽量不要以其他食物代替。

sentences.english: Thus, high-dose rate after-loading intracavitary therapy can be used to replace conventional radium therapy.
sentences.chinese: 所以高剂量率后装治疗可以代替常规镭疗。

sentences.english: It's okay to substitute  vegetable oil for butter.
sentences.chinese: 用植物油代替黄油也一样。

sentences.english: Oxy-hydrogen flame can replace other flames for cutting billet.
sentences.chinese: 完全可以代替其它燃气用于连铸坯切割。

sentences.english: The condition of the people was one of local self-sufficiency, and local customs displaced formal law.
sentences.chinese: 人们自给自足地生活，用地方惯例代替正规法律。

sentences.english: It just happens that we need a few salesmen now to replace those who are on vacation .
sentences.chinese: 现在赶巧我们需要几位售货员代替那些现在度假的。

sentences.english: Cover the pan with a clean dishtowel, replace the lid and allow to sit for 10 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用一条干毛巾布代替锅盖复住锅口，放10分钟。

sentences.english: The paper explored the manufacturing process of substitute wollastonite flour for barium sulfide to produce the alkyd putty.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了用硅灰石粉代替硫酸钡制造醇酸腻子。

sentences.english: Small drops of glass can be used instead of jewels in many electric instruments.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃颗粒可代替宝石轴承安装在电器仪表内。

sentences.english: Michale Huang China replaced Russia already, the video is old.
sentences.chinese: 中国已经代替俄罗斯了，这个视频旧了。

definition: to substitute for/to replace/to supersede
to replace/to supersede/to supplant/(chemistry) substitution
to exchange (sth) for (sth else)/to replace with/to convert into
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to exchange/to replace/to substitute for/to switch
to change over to/to switch to/to use (sth different)
substitute/alternative
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to serve as/to act as/to play the role of
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
need not
to be used for
to borrow sth for another use/to borrow an idea for one's own use
to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
for example/for instance/such as
or/possibly/maybe/perhaps
